properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naa sankata dhukkamulella theeripoyegaa Nashimpajeyu doota nannu daatipoyenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Viluvaina gorrepilla raktamu dwaaraa Kaligiyunna rakshanalo daagiyuntini{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Inka nenu Pharoku daasudanu kaanu Inka nenu siyonu kanyudanu gaanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Maarchabadu naadu maaraa madhuramugaa Paaru jalamu bandanundi thraaguchundunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Soundaryamayamagu parama kaanaanu naa nityamaina Swastyamadi marpujendadu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naa devude edaarilo naadu prabhuvu Naa devudichu krothamannaa naaku chaalunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naa Yesu prabhuve naa balamu gaanamu naa Yesu Prabhuve naa rakshana halleluya{/lang-eng}
